text: I never imagined something like this could happen to me, especially since I'm so cautious. But then I started noticing that my online activity felt different, slower even. I can't even describe it well because everything seemed normal, except for the fact that I was constantly getting logged out of my accounts. Looking back, maybe I should have paid more attention to the little details, but now it's too late. My accounts are compromised. The more I tried to fix it, the more problems came up. My bank account was unathorised, and then I got locked out of everything. I don’t think I’ve ever felt this violated before. My privacy is completely shattered, and I can’t do anything to make it stop. Even my laptop isn’t working right anymore. It’s so stange how everything just fell apart after that one email.
